explains: v. 笨拙地弄糟（botch 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: He completely botched up the interview.
The work they did on the house was a botched job.
sentences.cn: 他们整修房子做得一塌糊涂。

sentences.en: One of them, Bayer's girlfriend, helped plan the botched burglary and acted as a lookout.
sentences.cn: 其中一个是拜尔的女朋友，她帮助策划了这次拙劣的入室盗窃并充当了望风者。
